data.title: Cincinnati Reds Fans' Home for Baseball Discussion
data.meta_description:
There will be no Reds TV for today's game in Pittsburgh. 
 
In fact, only 6 of the next 10 Reds Games will be broadcast locally. 
 
What gives?? Why would you fly your entire TV crew to Atlanta and televise only ONE game?? 
 
UPCOMING REDS GAMES NOT ON TV: 
Wed. May 12, 12:35 PM @ Pittsburgh 
Tues. May 18, 12:35 PM vs. Milwaukee 
Thurs. May 20, 1:05 PM vs. Atlanta
data.text:
View Full Version : Lack of Reds Games on TV - WHY?
